page.title: 12Llanfihangel to Capel Seion
page.content: The health of the under fives is looked after by a travelling clinic which calls once a month to the farms & houses where they live. Llanfihangel have a church & Welsh chapel where services and Sunday School are held once a week. The church services are held alternately in English one week and Welsh the next. Activities centre around both church & chapel. Pisgah have a small chapel where weekly services are held. It was rebuilt in its present position in 1908 when the 'new' road was made.
